comment.author: 93183689@N00
comment._content: It's not an unidentified photographer. The credit in the lower left says "Pirie MacDonald, Photographer of Men". Also see this similar photo in the Library of Congress collection.

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for the comment! You're correct, it looks like Pirie MacDonald is the photographer. I'm confirming it with the Archives of American Art and will update it once I hear from them.

Cheers,
Effie, Smithsonian Institution Archives
